title: A Night With a SEAL
description: A Night With a SEAL is part of Kristen Proby’s With Me in Seattle Universe. One drunken night in Vegas. A lifetime of love.When Kayla and her friends go to Vegas for a blowout, she never expects to meet someone. But when she wakes up in a stranger’s bed, with two tattoos she can’t help but wonder what happened.As she starts to remember pieces of her night she remembers a handsome, kind man who was as hot as hell. One of the tattoos is Mrs. Colby and the other is a wedding ring. Did she just marry a complete stranger? Maddox Colby is in Vegas drowning his sorrows at being sent home injured from his last mission with the Seals. When he meets a beautiful woman, things go too far and they get married. You only live once, right?When he receives a call the next morning from a teammate who is heading out on a mission asking him to look after his sister who has an abusive ex, he offers to help. Until he sees the photo on his phone is of his new wife. He leaves to think things through and then Mrs. Colby disappears. At least he knows he will see her again back home in Seattle.When her ex threatens to upset their new life together, Maddox finds himself against the clock in a race to find his beautiful wife. Will he find her in time? When they’ve overcome one hurdle they need to tell her brother about them. Which is worse, her ex or her brother?
author: Lexi Noir
